value:
I betrayed all I knew for the woman
I love—my country, my lord...
Everything.

Sacrifice my life for king and country?
No. My life belongs to the wife I love.

My...departed wife weeps for me?
I'm sorry. You must be confused.
Monica is still among the living...

If anyone could understand, Princess
Eirika might. I would forsake all else
for my beloved...

There is nothing wrong... In fact,
I have never been happier.

Monica? Are you here? Have I been
deceived by $Nf?

Monica... I'll return soon. I will kill
those who wish to get in our way...

Hah hah hah... I hope you were
watching, Monica...
Gah! How can I face Monica like this?

I will use this power to defend
Monica's life for all of eternity...

My name is Orson. Please, I am
looking for my wife. Her name is
Monica... Is she here? Please...

Monica... Where are you? I want
to see you again...to gaze upon
your face.$k$pMy precious Monica, where is she?
Tell me, $Nu...$k$pUnless... Someone is trying to keep
Monica and me apart...$k$pBut our bond cannot be broken.
Not by god or demon...$k$pUntil I can see Monica again, I will
do as you ask... How many must I kill
to see her, $Nu?$k$pMonica, please... Wait for me.
I will see your gentle smile
again soon...
でやっ
Die...
ぐっ…
Not... yet!
You know nothing.
I am happy now.
You won't come between us!
Your life is pitiful!
Monica...If only...
Good, good.
I am Orson. Monica and I...will live happily.
I am busy... I must return to my wife's side.
What is it, Monica? You seem so happy today.
I'd never forget your birthday! I have a present for you, dear. I think you'll like it.
...Get out. This is Monica and my place. I will not have our home disturbed by anyone.
My fondest wish will be granted... To spend the rest of my days in the embrace of my loving wife once more...
...I will help you. But first, assure me that you will not get in my way.
Yes?
Monica?
It's too late!
